mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_calendar (calendar_no, channel, genre, title, content) VALUES (4 || LPAD(seq_tbl_calendar.nextval, 4, '0'), #{channel}, #{genre}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM rn, c_board.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_calendar WHERE channel LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' WHERE genre LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY calendar_no DESC ) c_board
